attributes.action: Ignore the French D-Day celebrations 2010 and have the UK Celebration 24hrs earlier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The D-Day invasion started FROM the UK so let us have any Commemorations, and Celebrations in 2010 FROM the UK, 24 hrs ahead of any Commemorations in France. THOUSANDS of UK Citizens and Veterans would then be able to attend, INCLUDING the Royal Family. Those Veterans unable to travel to the South of England could 'Join' any ceremony by an Internet Video link.
Let the people of the UK HELP !
Let the people of the UK DECIDE !
